name: Seasons of Care
description:
Quick thinking, local network co-operative game that focus around end-of-life questions. 

  Please take part in making this game better by completing the survey here https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe4ZZBDoo_ryx3zuaJsAbkX67fbCt8ZLzJO_hfk...

  Players will need to be connected to the same wifi network. One player will need to press the host button, all other players will join this game.

  Host should wait for all players to join before tapping ready

  Players will choose who they think will score highest in certain categories and wait for the questions to start.

  There will be several rounds of 4 seasons each. A question will be asked and players will decide who will take a certain job or action. The person who will take that action will tap on their screen. If the time runs out, or multiple players tap the screen, players will loose a chance.

  At the beginning of each round, the timer will decrease.

  The game is won if you answer all of the questions without loosing the amount of chances.

BUGS:

- Client displays failed game when the game is successful (host displays success)

- Job button doesn't disappear when the player runs out of time to answer question
